basics.name: Vasin Dmytro
basics.label: Ruby On Rails Developer
basics.summary: I would like to get into a friendly team, where I will have a possibility to improve my programming skills and to be involved in unusual major projects. I am Ruby on Rails developer with great passion for JS, finding inspiration in programming itself. First of all, I am seeking good and clear solutions to complex problems.

work.summary: It is a desktop cryptocurrency wallet built on React and Electron JS
highlights: Electron: Setup Autoapdates for native apps for Mac and Windows platforms
Electron: Add ability to pack project as a .DMG and .EXE files
Mock Server: Setup server as a stagin server for the app
USB Device: Add ability to communicate with USB device ( Approve and Decline)

work.summary: Beyondimagination is a site where models and stuidos can upload content for sale.
highlights: GEM: Create special solution for that project: Payment gem for CCBill payment system
AWS: Add ability to upload files to S3 in a background
Encoding: Encode video after uploading ( interact with Zencoder service )
Image Processing: Apply image uploading ( S3 ) + add ability to process image on the fly ( Imgix )
AWS: Write AWS Lambda to trigger callbacks on file uploads
Data transfer: Parse 2M links in parallel (Eventmachine + Fibers)

work.summary: On the site you can listen to popular religious radio stations, podcasts of famous businessmen, mothers and spiritual teachers, telling about their lives
highlights: SEO: Deep work with SEO optimisation ( Prerenderer.io, Screaming Frog )
FB Share: Setup publising to Facebook pages
RSS: Add RSS parsing from differend feed endpoints

skills.name: Ruby on Rails

SEO ( prerender.io, share on FB, TW tags )

React ( Redux, Babel, Webpack ) in home projects
